Name: Parallel Lakitu Camera

Scripts.Name: Patch parallel laktiu camera
Scripts.Script:
Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic
Imports System
Imports System.Collections.Generic
Imports System.IO
Imports System.Linq
Imports System.Windows.Forms
Imports SM64Lib
Imports Pilz.IO

Module Script

    Sub Main(params as IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, Object))
        Const ppfFileName = "parallel.ppf"
            Dim files As EmbeddedFilesContainer = params("files")
            Dim patchFile As String = files.GetLocalFilePath(ppfFileName)
            
            General.PatchClass.ApplyPPF(params("romfile"), patchFile)
    End Sub

End Module

Description:
Better parallel camera (made by abglab2)
- used version of 14th December 2018

Controls for better parallel lakitu camera:
- All old c-stick controls work the same leaving camera in 8-way angle mode without changing align
- Camera does not get stuck in c-up mode and cannons
- L button switches between parallel lakitu and non-parallel lakitu for water and flying
- Non-parallel mode for water and flying fixes camera when switching mario->lakitu to closest aligned 8-way direction
- D-pad left/right precise rotates lakitu camera allowing to change align
- D-pad down switches camera back to closest aligned 8-way direction
- D-pad up switches camera back to mario's angle
